name: Grey Soul Coffee Roasters
description:
This is how it all unfolded: Our founder, Chirag, a home brewer & roaster since a decade now was always a passion driven enthusiast.
Harvested in India, Roasted in Pune.
A one-year Journey starting with a bus ride back in January 2021 to the state of Karnataka.
Because telling a story is an impactful way to get closer to a brand …….
